page.title: 15SHOPPING & AMENITIES (1)
page.content:
There are only 5 shops in Thorner, and none in the surrounding farming areas.
There is a grocery/off-licence, a clothes/fancy goods shop, a post office, a woodworkers-joinery shop.
There is also a small bank with very limited opening hours.
Other amenities include three public houses, a garage and a lawn mower service centre.
Delivery vans to Thorner include a daily bakers round and a weekly wet fish round. There is also a mobile greengrocery, mobile library and a mobile fish and chip van.
